title: I Looked like a Bully, and I Was Sold a Fight, so I Rebelled - Novel Updates
tags: Bullying   Childhood Friends   Clever Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Sharp-tongued Characters
author: たかしろひと
description:
Are you guys fighting with each other?

A tumultuous daily life story of Sousuke Sugaya, who has the appearance (and looks) of a bullied kid, living his daily life while rebelling against various bullies (including adults) with all his might!>
